1.title: Web of the Black Widow

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: A man steals a truckload of narcotics and sells them to a local godfather, only to find his wife has been kidnapped and is being ransomed and tortured for the money he was paid.

2.title: Death Is a Silent Witness

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: A woman becomes a target for death after it is discovered that she is the sole witness to a grisly murder-which no one else believes happened.

3.title: The Black Testament of Solange

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: After a wealthy woman dies in an alleged "accident," her daughter returns home from boarding school to find that her own life may be threatened by someone with an eye for the family fortune.

4.title: Sinistique

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Shop worker Darryl is assaulted in an "accident" by colleague Billy after witnessing Billy and his girlfriend in flagrante delicto. Left with a potentially deadly brain injury, his tormentors begin to die of cerebral hemorrhages similar to what he may soon experience himself, leading to an investigation stymied by Darryl's indisputable alibis.

5.title: The One That Got Away

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: An exotic dancer is nearly strangled by a serial killer targeting sex trade workers. After surviving a second attack in her home, she is persuaded to leave town for a weekend camping with friends-which does not go as planned.

6.title: The Turning of the Page

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: While en route to a coveted job interview, a young man is accosted and trapped by a scheming colleague who plans to eliminate the competition for once and all.

7.title: Embrace of the Black Scorpion

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: When he discovers his wife is cheating on him, a restaurateur hires an assassin to kill her in an "accident." Arriving at her home to perform the hit, the hired killer becomes unexpectedly involved with her and soon the pair conceive a plan to kill her husband instead.

8.title: The Skeleton Crew

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: An indie film crew recreates the final days and brutal, unsolved murder of a young woman in the house where it actually happened-and where others may yet occur.

9.title: Now That Mommy's Gone

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: The widow of a fanatical cult leader is killed in a staged "suicide." Soon after, members of her family begin to meet death in "accidents" which point to a possible perpetrator; or do they?

10.title: A Blade with Two Edges

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: A man, desperate for money and hiding from the law, devises a plan to trade places with his identical twin-with unexpected results.

11.title: The Kindness of Strangers

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: A young man is forced into a foster home after his father kills his mother. While there, he becomes aware that someone will kill to keep him from testifying in the case.

12.title: Fugitive Without a Face

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: A man suffering from brain injury-induced amnesia must track down his own whereabouts for the past six months, while being pursued by a psychotic hit-man.

1.title: The Diabolical Doctor V

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: While residing in a remote cottage, a biochemist disfigured by flesh eating bacteria conducts grisly experiments on a young man while the local police-and a mysterious young woman-investigate his disappearance.

2.title: Insecticus

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: A newlywed couple visit a tiny island where they hope to build their dream home. To their horror, they find it is infested by a large variety of man-eating insects.

3.title: Adam and Evil

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: A dangerously disturbed young man with a severely dysfunctional home life kills the girl of his dreams and confesses-only no one will believe him.

4.title: Whispering Grave

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Two ghost-hunting sisters visit an ancient cemetery to observe the grave of accused witch Abigail Adams on the centennial of her murder only to find she isn't quite dead.

5.title: Don't Stay After School

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: While a serial killer stalks a small, rural community, a high-school senior finds herself the victim of school gossip, bullies and-when trapped in the school after hours-a deadly killer.

6.title: Portrait of Jadine

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: An embittered, gold-digging woman receives a curious gift from her soon to be ex-husband on the eve of their divorce: A portrait doll whose face she soon regrets mangling.

7.title: Nightmare at Blood Manor

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Patti Blood travels through a winter storm with her indifferent father and hateful stepmother for the reading of her birth mother's will. Can her mother's ghost protect her from a deadly family conspiracy?

8.title: Die Laughing

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: While struggling to keep his job as clown in a run-down traveling circus, drunken, foul-tempered Gus Evans persuades a carnival fortune-teller to help him "undo" a grisly murder he has committed using supernatural powers. To his horror, she does.

9.title: A Face to Die For

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Wealthy but embittered burn victim Sylvia Snyder discovers her inept husband is having an affair with a local stripper. With the help of her maid, she blackmails him into committing murder and performing a life altering face-transplant surgery.

10.title: Night Winds

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: While living on a remote farm, an abused wife enlists the aid of her friends to safeguard her from her violent husband. She later kills him in self defense-or does she?

11.title: The Devil's Locket

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: 9-year old Kelly is torn between her divorced parents and their lingering hostility, until her mother enlists the aid of a cursed locket to exact a horrific revenge-with surprising results.

12.title: Daughter of the Damned

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: A woman adopted at birth travels to the rural home of her natural parents with her boyfriend to uncover the story behind her adoption. They discover a curious link between her parents and an epidemic of vampires.

1.title: June Bride

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: A young man murders the prostitute he's been seeing to hide their relationship from his fiancée. A haunting ensues which culminates on his wedding night.

2.title: My Dreams of Blood

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Dan and Jennifer are parents of a near-psychic child whose nightmares take a shocking, prophetic turn while on a family outing in the remote wilderness of Michigan's northern Great Lakes. Terror ensues.

3.title: Blood Sacrifice

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Four weekend campers in the woods of New England battle jealousy, revenge and a return from the grave of a demon-worshiping father whose blood sacrifices sustain his son's life.

4.title: Curse of Willow Lake

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Serial killer Cliff Crawford buys a home for his wife and estranged foster daughter near the remote country lake where he's spent years dumping the bodies of his victims. To his horror, he finds the lake contains much more than human remains.

5.title: Diary of a Mantis

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Beautiful Anita is unable to control her homicidal tendencies after surviving a bizarre assault. She conceals her crimes until she meets the man she wants to spend her life with-if he'll live that long.

6.title: Mesmerized

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: A murderous, drunken circus clown gains a new lease on life as a traveling nightclub hypnotist. His sultry assistant Wan begins to suspect a connection between his bizarre stage act and a series of brutal homicides in the towns where they play.

7.title: Harley Returns

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Young Kelly Matcalfe is released from a mental institution, only to be reunited with a possessed Harlequin doll and a lethal family agenda.

8.title: Bed and Breakfast

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Finding themselves "in trouble," a worried young couple marries quickly and escapes to a remote Bed and Breakfast honeymoon run by a demon-worshiping woman and her husband-who have much more than inn-keeping on their minds.

9.title: Daddy's Little Girl

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: In the wake of her mother's mysterious death, a young girl is tortured by a sadistic nanny while her necrophiliac father elopes with a new woman.

10.title: Toby's Room

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: When his older brother runs away from home, a young man's OuiJa board leads to a night of horror during a tense homecoming with his estranged parents.

11.title: Queen Bee

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: A teen aged girl's plan to join a high school clique backfires when she obtains a cursed brooch with which she plans to exact a gruesome revenge against those who bullied her.

1.title: Prisoner of Love

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: A young man runs away from home with his girlfriend, finding shelter in a 19th century barn where a hideously disfigured girl has just committed a gruesome crime.

2.title: Do Not Pass

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: One by one, inhabitants of a small rural town are terrorized-and killed-by the unseen driver of a black 1960 Plymouth Fury which haunts the one and only road leading from town.

3.title: A Birthday Wish

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: A terminally ill man uses black magic to devise unique plans for cheating death and maintaining communication with his young daughter-if all goes according to plan.

4.title: Masque of Horror

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: The jealous wife of a philandering shop owner discovers the power of "Tatu Tafakari," an ancient African fetish mask whose curse enables her to exact a gruesome revenge on her rival.

5.title: Feast of Flesh

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: A Goth girl devise a witchcraft-fueled method for eliminating her boyfriend's hateful sister and mother after she moves into his family's home.

6.title: The Hour of 13

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: When her mother leaves town for the weekend, a socially awkward teen aged girl invites a group of "hip" friends over for a slumber party. They soon decide to entertain themselves by invoking the spirit of a local woman who was the victim of a gruesome, unsolved murder.

7.title: Angel of Death

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: While on his deathbed, a bitter man is visited by a seemingly cruel nurse whose demonic practices may hold the key to his survival.

8.title: Drink the Blood of Manalu

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Merciless tale of floundering college students Evan and Pete, who discover they can salvage their careers if they obey the ancient, shrunken head of an Amazonian witch doctor named Manalu.

9.title: Don't Look Under the Bed

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: A terrified mother invokes the powers of a demon to protect her from her homicidal child with disastrous results.

10.title: The Witch's Candle

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Grisly, violent tale of corporate downsizing gone wrong as a ruthless supervisor blackballs her employees to assure her own position after a merger.

11.title: The Wings of Satan

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: When teen-aged Neal's affair with his mysterious tutor, Bernie is discovered by prom queen Christa, she enlists the aid of a militant girlfriend to ruin him-if Bernie and an ancient cult don't stop her first.

12.title: Penny Pockets

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Blaming her husband for the death of their newborn baby, Penny Gillespie goes on a murderous rampage before being institutionalized as criminally insane. Ten years later, she escapes just as a knife wielding clown-for-hire named "Penny Pockets" shows up at the home of her now ex-husband and his new wife.

1.title: Blood of the Living Dead

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Two vacationing couples discover an extremely remote stretch of land in Michigan's upper peninsula is home to bizarre supernatural apparitions, a psychotic old woman and a breeding ground of the flesh eating undead.

2.title: Vengeance of Manalu

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: In this sequel to the season three entry, "Drink the Blood of Manalu," a young man obtains the shrunken head of an Amazonian witch doctor which empowers him with telekinetic abilities-for a price.

3.title: Tortures of the Damned

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Three reckless, bored teens go on a crime spree and hide out in a supposedly haunted country house where years earlier, a psychotic man subjected his spiteful wife to a series of ghastly tortures. Soon, they begin to suspect he has returned-with good cause.

4.title: Slaughterhouse Sorority

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Four college co-eds spend the weekend at a lonely farmhouse, where a game of strip poker leads to a lethal hazing and months later, a grisly mystery.

5.title: Curse of Lizzie Crippin

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: In this sequel to the season two entry, "Queen Bee," a teen-aged girl, disfigured by an ancient curse, enlists the aid of a quack spiritualist to restore her face at the expense of her enemies.

6.title: My Brother's Reaper

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: When his girlfriends begin to die in bizarre, ritualistic ways, popular college boy Mark begins to suspect his creepy brother Edwin is responsible--especially when Edwin begins to manifest telekinetic powers.

7.title: Experiment in Horror

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: When the employee of a light industrial firm is bypassed for promotion and forced to report to a conspiratorial colleague, he uses a radical brain altering technique to transform a shop worker into an executioner--with surprising results.

8.title: Kiss the Blood from My Lips

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: In this violent shocker, a beautiful young heiress employs black magic to save her father's life while a mystery develops around her shady boyfriend and gold-digging stepmother.

9.title: Scream! Scream, Little Sara!

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: In this follow up to the season three entry, "Penny Pockets," a homicidal clown hides out in the home of her latest victim. Soon however, she begins receiving phone calls from a dead child whom she plans to resurrect.

10.title: Flesh Eaters of Candlemas Eve

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: A young woman runs afoul of a coven of witches after freeing their human sacrifice-but not before a ghastly curse is laid upon her.

11.title: How I Dismembered Your Mother

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Violent tale about an unbalanced man driven to a wild, blood-spattered killing spree when his wife announces her plans to divorce him.

12.title: Bad Boys Go to Hell

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Grisly tale about a teen-aged girl, ostracized by family and classmates, who develops a secret life as a particularly perverse serial killer.

13.title: Secret of the Blood Children

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: Four college students planning to spend Spring break at a lonely cottage run over a man en route. Fearing retribution, one of them kills him to ensure the futures of each. Months later, they begin to realize he may not be as dead as they thought.

1.title: Resurrection of the Damned

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: 13 years after a small-town serial killer is himself murdered, the daughter of one of his victims finds herself at odds with her family and classmates until she devises a plan to restore him to life for one final killing spree.

2.title: Black Friday

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: A light industrial firm is the setting for this blood-spattered tale as one of its employees is mutilated in an "accident" by one of the co-workers whom he was blackmailing-but which one? He returns later, power drill in hand, to exact a hideous revenge.

3.title: Doomsday's Fury

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: An unbalanced man kills his ex-wife in order to gain custody of their daughter, who flees into the night after witnessing the act. Hunted by police, he returns disguised as a clown on Halloween to reclaim her, slaughtering anyone who stands in his way.

4.title: Rest in Pieces

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Spring Break takes a deadly turn for fraternity brothers who kill a girl they slept with when she threatens to blackmail them.

5.title: I'll Be Homicidal for Christmas

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: 13 years after killing his daughter on Christmas Eve, a killer is paroled and tracks down his son after discovering the young man is planning to write a tell-all book about his father's infamous crime.

6.title: You Take My Breath Away

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: A psychotic woman methodically plans to kill the sons of her newly divorced boyfriend as he prepares to celebrate his new promotion.

7.title: Wait 'til Your Father Gets Home

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: When a woman discovers her husband is planning to leave her, she enlists the aid of her daughter to help her stage his "accidental" death. A grim haunting ensues culminated by his return in the body of his young son.

8.title: Beauty Is Only Skinned Alive

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: In one of the series' most brutal and unrelenting episodes, an embittered, hideously disfigured woman named Ursula entraps several women in a small-town beauty salon where she robs and subjects them to various tortures.

9.title: Don't Turn Out the Lights

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: In this grim tale, a bizarre implement of torture and death is employed when a glamorous woman brings her boyfriend's wealthy family to her upscale home for a weekend visit.

10.title: The Crimson Urge

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: The lonely woods of a small town is the setting for this harrowing tale involving a family who finds themselves terrorized by a psychotic killer whose specialty is women with red hair.

11.title: The Good Humour Man

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: The local police department investigates when the children of three ex-cons are kidnapped by a mute ice-cream man who cages and tortures them in the basement of a rural cottage.

12.title: The Things We Did Last Summer

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Sex, murder and mystery combine in this provocative entry, in which the summer employees of a small country resort are being killed off by an unseen hand.

1.title: Say No More

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: A teen-aged boy and his friends accidentally kill a mysterious girl on a lonely dirt road. But when one of them threatens to confess, he realizes he must kill again to preserve his secret.

2.title: The Night Rena Came Back from the Dead

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Tragedy strikes when a group of small-town junior-high students gets together for an unsupervised Halloween party, at which one of them dies in an accident. Years after the survivors hide their crime, they are stalked and murdered by a killer wearing the same Halloween mask as their one-time victim.

3.title: Last Night, Tonight and Tomorrow

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: When a dysfunctional family reunites for Thanksgiving, they are joined by the long-lost son of their matriarch, whose mental health may or may not be behind a series of ghastly deaths.

4.title: Black Fortune

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Revenge sex leads to murder when a young man returns from the hospital with a brain injury after being attacked by his girlfriend's former lover.

5.title: The Last Confession

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: A widower sends his foster sons to boarding school after his ex-hooker girlfriend is murdered. Years later, he is presumed dead in a conflagration and his now grown sons return to the family homestead, setting in motion a new wave of homicide.

6.title: Final Exam

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Death stalks a college campus as the elite top-five members of its graduating class are systematically run over and killed one at a time by a dimly seen assailant driving a 1989 Buick Riviera.

7.title: Hard Time

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: A young woman cries "rape" when discovered by her husband engaging in a threesome with two young men, leading to their prison sentences. After their parole, she begins receiving anonymous death threats, leading her best friend to suspect foul play when she "accidentally" dies from a drug overdose.

8.title: Night Shaft

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: An employee in a large warehouse witnesses an assault taking place on a security camera monitor. When the case is seemingly closed by police, he launches his own investigation with deadly results.

9.title: Vendetta by Numbers

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: The girlfriends - former, current and prospective - of college student Rick are being systematically murdered by a serial killer who taunts the local police department with bizarre phone calls.

10.title: Kill and Kill Again

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: When a young woman goes missing, a psychic who occasionally works with the police department is enlisted to help locate her. After her vision proves too revealing, she is herself murdered and soon a young reporter finds himself embroiled in a potentially lethal investigation.

11.title: Three, Two, One

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Harrowing tale of a loan shark who is robbed of $150,000 by a prostitute, whom he later follows to a remote cottage where she is spending the weekend with friends.

12.title: The Damned Die Naked

episode of.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: A small town is the setting for this offbeat entry, in which a young man, victimized by a sadistic baby sitter as a child, is driven to commit a series of horrific murders as he slowly recalls the events of his past.

imdb.plot outline: "Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour" is a half-hour crime/mystery/suspense anthology which features seamy characters, shady deeds and cruelly ironic finales. Not for the faint of heart, the series recalls the brutal Italian "Giallo" thrillers of the 1970s thanks to its complicated plots, gritty style and suggestive content.
imdb.title: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour
akas: Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour (United States)
plot: "_Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour_ (qv)" is a half-hour crime/mystery/suspense anthology which features seamy characters, shady deeds and cruelly ironic finales. Not for the faint of heart, the series recalls the brutal Italian "Giallo" thrillers of the 1970s thanks to its complicated plots, gritty style and suggestive content.
synopsis: Each month, host Lee Martin guides viewers through all-new tales of the macabre in this cult TV anthology. Noted for its tightly scripted tales peppered with sex, mystery and irony, the series has influenced many indie film producers since its September 6, 2008 debut and garnered a loyal fan-base of viewers hungry for its special brand of malice.The show's anthology format has allowed its creators to explore a wide range of themes, all of which share a final "twist" in their closing minutes before Martin returns to sum things up. Sometimes referred to as a hybrid between "Alfred Hitchcock Presents" and "The Twilight Zone," "Lee Martin's The Midnight Hour" has created for itself a brand as unique as its storytelling.
